hurtfull gracelesse men prick annoie lillie good name liberty liues two person borne world one lillie thorne trod downe lillie cain drew brother feild slue afterwards one would haue thought thornes bin destroied flood brought vpon world purpose yet cham left whome quickely sprowted cursed race cananites euer prick side thornes eye god people newe thing iacob ouertopped esau ioseph pricked molested home abroad neither father house father eye safegard nay fairest lillie euer saw sunne beset thornes euer innocencie wisedome meeknesse puritie loue could keepe pricked heart wounded death euen shamefull ignominious death crosse lillie beset thornes egypt wildernesse babylon iudea christ sent disciple sheepe among wolues tenne persecution day shall till great day thornes shall cast fire wonder thornes nature good nothing pricke burne standeth therefore lillie hand much carefull fence themselues molestation shall doe obseruing fowre rule thornes hinder rooting lillie must double diligence rooting themselues ground true religion yeeldeth hope rising stablishing continuance faith thornes seeke keepe sunne lillie hinder comfortable heat light word must much carefully frequent themselues take themselues ciuill law calleth seruants nonlatin alphabet sustaine person become dependance adiuncts yea indeede reasonable instrument hand master motiues would stirre vp diligence vnto worke god want multitude asreasons stirr vp diligence high seruice tim matth matth master hath absolute power life death ouer seruants eie euer ouer prouoketh euen eiepleasers quicknesse fruit diligence sauing selues others blessed shall seruant master shall finde without thou shalt become vnprofitable seruant shall bound hand foote cast hell seruice difficult beeing haruest husbandrie building planting require labourer painfull workemen diligent hand bringeth workes commendable passe nay sighting spirituall weapon mightie malitious enemy requireth quicknesse courage busines needeth whole army souldiers reade sam ranne away sawe goliah farre one poore contemptible dauid good word saith thy seruant goe fight philistim v brings businesse happily forward nation formermatth see picture euill slothfull seruant whose ende euangelist recordeth fearefull second dutie faithfulnesse cor faithfulnes required euery dispenser found faithfull faithfulnes must appeare gaining disciple himselfe vnto christ iohn faithful seruant christ must increase must decrease paul seeke ioh present virgin vnto christ lawe equitie concludeth whatsoeuer seruant gaineth become master world full house god numb nay christ himselfe herein preferred heb faithfull appointed wherein faithfulnes seene moses thing according patterne mount christ doctrine father neither thing himselfe father taught advancing owne estate enriching seate decking whore babylon pulling downe kingdome christ trampling testament vnder feete decree canon councels men must iustle counsel god addition tradition men must doctrine beleeued receiued written word god christ acknowledged onely lord husband church also pittie euen protestant minister fewe may bee charged demas sinne embracing present world doe2 tim king needes must become faithfull vnto christ hazael benhadad goeth alone forsaking truth next inseparable companion comfort minister seruice vse doctrine ministreth comfort vnto faithful ministerie howsoeuer world esteemeth lord highly respecteth admitteth priuie counsel imployeth service angel themselues desire prie beeing seruants sure protection psal dauid seruant god bold pray safetie hence minister called starres right hand christ onely disposeth according pleasethreu also note safetie securitie alwaies keepeth euen within right hand master serue reuenge wrong otherwise dauid indignity seruants hanun sam becomes paymaster receiue wage performing dutie faithfully loose labour although israel gathered isay sweete sauour vnto god euen perish vse teacheth people esteeme minister namelypeople account seruice honourable seruants god consequently ministerie message god moses must murmured hee speakes freely roughly micha resolue faithfulnesse saying lord liueth soeuer lord saith good euill kin speake hated fed bread water affliction reasonable plea full pacification ciuill message pray angrie mee seruant yet ieremie shall say truth lord hath sent mee ier foot shall neuerthelesse fastned stock nay consideration bind men peace touching lord prophet harme also vrge haue exceeding honour least workes sake thess cor lord therefore acknowledgeth coworkers himselfe vse let euery priuate christian account also honourlet none shamed seruice lord vouchsafeth become seruant hereby harden thy selfe scornes derision mocking michals seeke disgrace thy sinceritie vngodly world would turne thy glorie shame euen thou wouldest haue sonne man ashamed thee kingdome thou ashamed professe thy selfe seruant thy glorie let none take crowne thy head thou seruest master thou cast house prooueth disinherited vse standeth v hand looke legitimation least loose inheritancethe adopted sonnes god naturall sonnes minister outward shewes intitle v adopted sonne god must naturall sonne minister one standeth ceremonie feeleth heart sinceritie religion naturall sonne church come church heare pray receiue sacrament giue good word religious person exercise good cheape man may performe outward seruices get praise men yet want praise god thing must done insisted would haue god praise v quest may doe get approbation god an lord loueth prayseth also truth inward part must beware guile become nathaniels men without guilfull spirit get heart circumcised may iewes within letter onely examine thy spirit eie flesh cannot pearcet ie thy selfe sparkle god image spirit eie doth discerne enquireth whether thy heart temple christian sacrifice prayer praise daily kindled whether thy soule arke keeping table pot manna treasuring word pearle thy portion whether pretious property quality practises although retained still shape place men like nebuchadnezzar changed shape beast haue thought although god could haue done odin vnderstanding together kingdome taken driuen ordinance god forceably fastned vpon professe themselues christian euery one must farre inordinate walking thess must withdraw himselfe man neuer professor christ worke ought eate let starue blood encourage v faithfulnes diligence duty calling see ioshua whereas creature liue vnto themselues man appointed liue aswell others himselfe church countrie familie poore euery man challengeth part euery mana proper embleame person mentioned therefore although creature bellie crabfish walketh teeth yet christian man must hand one eye another foote another shoulder support another must consist bellie teeth aske thy selfe good doth life church commonwealth family men thy conscience answer truly little none maist thou conclude surely rather bellie man many belly want eares honest calling schoole secret heart laid open bringeth sight sinne breake acknowledgement confession truth saying god indeed nothing word tell man thought nothing else pronounce sentence according heart therefore cannot come god whose priuiledge search heart hath made vse let minister gird sharp sword vpon thigh strike downe high thought men speaking rather conscience eares men else word spirituall directly worketh vpon heart spirit looseth hand proper worke powerfull vse alone two edged sword mouth christrev whereby get victorie dauid said goliahs truely may say sword philosophy poetrie profane thing blunt peirce spirit weake conuert soules dull giue sinne corruption deadly blowes death wound whosoeuer would turne men wicked way euill inuentions must stand god counsell ier declare word people note true leuite haue law truth vnder lip malac labour hearing word find thus diuinely powerfully working thy heart finde thy soule stricken sence death eternall find sacrificing knife cut throate thy sinnes lustfull affection find shake astonish thy soule onely way thee finde rest day trouble abac slay thy sinnes slayeth thy selfe insensibly neuer returneth vaine patient suffer thy hypocrisie vncleannes yea thy close inward sinnes discouered ministery thou seest light lord searching bowells thy bellie prou say surely god although find presence thunder lightning earthquake mount yet still voice lord commeth speaketh soule voice cast downe strong hold see shaken within mee none bind conscience none summon thought none else made worke flintie heart like waxe woman well conceiued nothing aboue ordinarie christ till came neere told secret vncleane course could acknowledge prophet could aske neighbour messias hath told mee euer euen lord iesus word telleth thee thy way come thy selfe call thy neighbour thee learne instruction christ told nathaniel saw vnder figge tree thought could say surely thou art sonne god king israel euen thou findest word discouering thee thou thoughtest hid euery eye thou maist say truely word sonne god herein resembleth findeth figge leaues calleth mee bush hid selfe thou maist bold affirme surely prophet god israel king discouer secret king syria word speaketh priuie chamber truely man god tell thought counsells take priuie chamber soule yea secret retyred closet heart many acquainted lesson storme rage word pricketh thinke preacher informed beginne suspect intelligencers truth haue intellengencer euen spirit goeth gehezi stayeth ananias saphirah till secret conveyance discouered reuenged day darknes alike let time beware spurne thee professe subiection christ lord scribe many v say doe like younger brother said father would goe worke vineyard many v may fitly heare sharp rebuke christ call yee master professe selues become singular pattern example moderation subduing extinguishing rebellious motion affection pastime perturbation also preseruing wise vigilant care mindes may kept temper becommeth sobrietie age monstrous olde men watch twilight haue eye full adulterie haue mouthes filled foule rotten communication drunke wine vnto excesse exceeding odious thing aboue younger person fall misdemeanour excuse might pretended might forced headstrength passion perturbation seeme rather force themselues sinne election willingly leaue sinnes haue almost left nay rather strengthen mindes lust body broken decaied thrust themselues vnder power lewde master whome man would haue thought long haue parted free men olde age age ought dedicated minde meditation counsel ought taken vp seemely delight desire euen spirituall heauenly ought watch lust presse downe aged man may serue lord libertie cherefulnes intend straightning reckoning god finishing vp saluation feare trembling euerie christian ought haue conuersation heauen much haue one foote graue hasten vnto earth vse precept iustly reprehendeth many elder sort whose bone seeme still possesse sinnes youth minded lay downe lust graue themselues meane lie without care beautifying gray haires grace discreete moderation word behauiours remaine vaine light foolish without sauour grace euer warmest blood euen dregges setled bottome vessell course acknowledge place neuer aduance embolden themselues returne vndutifull answer vnto master mistress manner many let vse vnfaithfulnesse good fidelitie cheefe vertue seruant euery thing requireth consideration subdueth violent affectiof pride worketh heart affection beseeme selues befit offender two time present pitie compassion hope time come former two fitter affection christia anger wrath vnconuerted forceable argument mooue v workes mercie loue towards body men flesh appeareth isa thou shalt hide thy selfe thine owne flesh bring wanderer thy house couer naked deale thy bread hungrie ought much helpe beare owne burden fulfill law christ affection would set men worke talking iesting disgracing men fall slip especially professor meate musick scorner herein iustly prouoke lord giue themselues vp feareful sinnes iust reproach byword men compassion would cause set hand help snare counsell pray nay set heart bleeding rather reioysing sinne rather monster man could see man take fall breaking back necke could turne iest man wound himselfe deadly make meriment least droppe humanitie would helpe vp former thrust napkin stanch blood latter hath nature taught thee duty bodie man hast bee clensed filthinesse thus haman could long time refraine himselfe mordecay sinne many moe deceiue themselues counterfeit repentance whereby feele crie vpon confesse vvith griefe sembling saul poore liberall sermon set apart small thing good v rest herein sufficient acquittance vnrighteousnesse vvhereas neuer thinke tisfaction restoring againe haue robbed according avv repentance let punish themselues pray fast giue almes yet lord vvill neuer vvhit regard band vvicnednes loosed others short humiliation seruile kinde flatterie god proceeding slauish feare selfeloue vvill come confesse sinne promise vvill transgresse yet dissemble double heart many haue knowne whose extorted righteousnesse hath morning dew sicknes distresse haue humbled themselues iewes corne wine haue howled cried vpon bed returned high affected deliuerance repentance fawned vpon god get hand wordly sorrowes infinite men deceiue themselues rest sufficient repentance latter sort deceiue themselues turning eye sin vertues grace find soules hence haue men diligent hearing word gladly herod thinke enough dispence holding herodias sweet sinne others reioyce affected haue knowne soft hearted protestant could melt sermon teares great affection yet haue made little conscience wayes mortifying deed flesh haue yeelded lust raines libertie others receiue word talke yeeld seemely obedience vnto man would say surely good christian yet bad ground giue depth enough giue vnderstanding affection whole ioy carried vnto talke onely haue tasted tongue cooke seruices haue filled bellie prepared sightly obedience like herod many thing iohn good man word reuerent liberall minister kind professor forward good motion lend hand purse helpe godly trouble yet commendable duty like deceitfull bow cast crooked let eye aime neuer right marke casteth quite besides way euen proceeding fro deepe hypocrisie done purely sinister respect furthering deceiue soule keepe farre happinesse graunt good heart naturall hypocrisie mingling selfe bringing forth fruites yet swayes heart resisted mastered maine sway good heart sincere choosing good thing purely god themselues thus former vse large doctrine sheweth number men woman seeme good christian yet naturall condition haue tained first degree renouation deceiued borne liue without god great mercie like die miserie condition like man hath thousand deadly disease yet sencelesse whose case euerie man say remedilesse let euery man woman enter narrowe examination themselues neuer rest till finde themselues renewed spirit mind god haue let man see error hereby truely say hath beene deceiued hath path life reuealed vnto let acknowledge finger god still pray dauid open mine eye may see thy lawe shall see mine owne error better hide thy commandements thou seest man goe deceiueable course pitie pray counsell deale meekely tenderly thou wast also time past deceiued seruing lust diuerse pleasure hauing spoken corruption mind men vnconuerted come depravation will meane capablenes abilitie willing truely good principle selfethe bondage considered right obiect god shall send grace conuersion denie actuall freedome coaction compulsion nature cannot admit vnlesse resteth wholsome word maintaineth error hath turned foundation one contemneth iudgement church despiseth wholsome admonition continueth damnable opinion light minde check accusation conscience beeing speaketh romish church obeyeth whatsoeuer pope decreeth cannot auoid name teach doe conuiction saint heauen mediator merit prayer prayer made saint dead men iustified merit workes fasting prayer wholsome word rite ceremony edifying orderly inoffensiue superstitious obiect peeuish neuer conuinced satisfied answ reason hereof seemes church sometimes partie question therefore wisedome bring vpon party iudgement reformed church make vp conuiction good meanes vsed men separate church let lie iustly vnder reproach sin farre euery one carrieth diuerse iudgement concerning rite church wherein liues presently become scismatike one may still cleaue heart affection personall presence vnto church farre interrupting vnitie church yea farre euery departure call themselues church yea maine point doctrine scisme elia elizeus scismatikes departed ieroboams worship sauiour christ apostle scismatikes departing doctrine pharisies saduces ieroboam preists pharisies pretended themselues church departing truth true vnitie author scisme herein rite stoppe papist mouth shall say men depart rite tending weakning faith doctrine offensiue superstitious presently ranked amongst scismatikes haue selues thus departed hundred romish ceremony yet say author scisme therein let rectifie iudgements keepe v rash censure matter capitall difficult catholike spirit still reproach v scismatikes surely reioyce herein whose canon hath taught v christ apostle would subscribe decree escape tearmes reputed scismatikes least burnt heretikes secondly note haue bin shall end heresy church christ sooner commandements god article faith truly said turned foundation cannot euery error religion doe keepe apostle allegorie comparing profession religion building great house error lesser besides foundation may thought breaking downe window greater breaking downe side house yet house standeth although much defaced ouerturne whole house rase verie foundation doctrine iustification workes point alone putteth men quite estate christ shutteth kingdome heauen gal whence might obserued needfull thing euery one well grounded point catechisme thing dangerously neglected beeing grounded looke well themselues least turned depart holy commandements thus end would far worse beginning come latter degree sinne hee sinneth beeing damned himselfe wilfully sinneth addeth sinne sinne maintaining errour bringers cast backe yea pull backe many others might brought accustome themselues graceles course change ethiopian skin certainly although also bragge good faith godward yet better deuils haue shall
